Sasquatch had the 3rd most snow for North American Ski Hills at over 1200cms! NOT in the Speculation Tax Area for 2nd Homes! Priced to Sell and Won't last long!

If you are looking for peace and quiet and an affordable, comfortable home be sure to check this one out!
